tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group

Class Textarea

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group.ControllerGroup<Textarea>
      • tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group.Textarea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlListener, ControllerInterface<Textarea>, SkatoloConstants

    public class Textarea
extends ControllerGroup<Textarea>
implements ControlListener
    a textarea can be used to leave notes, it uses the skatolo BitFont to render text. Scrollbars will automatically be added when text extends the visible area. Textarea extends ControllerGroup, for more methods available see the ControllerGroup documentation.

      • controlEvent

        public void controlEvent(ControlEvent theEvent)
        Description copied from interface: ControlListener
        controlEvent is called by skatolo's ControlBroadcaster to inform available listeners about value changes. Use the CallbackListener to get informed when actions such as pressed, release, drag, etc are performed.
        Specified by:
        controlEvent in interface ControlListener
        Overrides:
        controlEvent in class ControllerGroup<Textarea>
        Parameters:
        theEvent - ControlEvent
        See Also:
        skatolo.CallbackListener, skatolo.CallbackEvent
